Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['Turn on the TV with the remote control.']

def is_near_television(remote_control:item, television:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control is near the television
    symbol near_tv=close(remote_control, television)
    return near_tv

behavior turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(television)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Select a remote control
        
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television)
        # Select a television
        
        if not is_near_television(remote_control, television):
            # If the remote control is not near the television, move closer
            achieve close_char(char, television)
        
        turn_on_tv(remote_control, television)
        # Use the remote control to turn on the television
